segments.text: I watch this kitchen scene and feel a pang of sadness for what's about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so absorbed in her task, unaware of the water flooding the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, ruining the cabinets and wetting the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be heartbroken when she realizes the damage later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to mischief, reaching for cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool looks so vulnerable, one wrong move and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, but this could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a beautiful garden, full of peace that's missing inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter remind me of normal family routines.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress make her look like a caring mom, yet she's missing it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them; it's such a shame to see potential joy turn to sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies in the jar are meant for sharing happily, not stolen in haste.
segments.speaker: PAR
